name: 托马斯·爱迪生
bio: 史上最多产的发明家之一，拥有超过1000项专利。发明电灯泡、留声机、电影摄影机，创建了世界第一个工业研究实验室。他的发明彻底改变了人类生活方式。
bio_en: America's most prolific inventor, holding over 1,000 patents. Invented the practical incandescent light bulb, the phonograph, and the motion picture camera. Established the world's first industrial research laboratory at Menlo Park. His innovations in electrical power generation and distribution transformed modern life.
